string.text: I, professor Kruglov, am deleted the results of our research for the sake of science and humanity as a whole. Dangerous knowledge must not pass into the hands of unreliable people who will seek to use it for the achievement of their criminal objectives. Those who read this note should know that our group was shot down above the Wild Territory by Freedom anarchists led by a notorious cutthroat called Wolfhound. By the time you read this we will probably be dead.

... как оказалось, излучение прежде всего воздействует на высшие области мышлени€. ќпыты показали, что только человек и животные с высокоорганизованным мышлением, такие как собаки, лошади, чувствительны к этому излучению. »з них лишь человек полностью подвержен эффекту погружени€ в транс, на подопытных животных эффект оставалс€ в пределах сильного страха. »сход€ из этих предпосылок, можно сделать вывод о специализации воздействи€ исключительно на человеческий мозг. ѕродолжительные эксперименты на Ђдобровольцахї показали, что эффект транса может быть сн€т при медикаментозном лечении. “акже, нами были разработаны экспериментальные устройства, которые защищают человеческий мозг от дозированного воздействи€ излучени€. ѕо нашим расчетам источник излучени€ находитс€ в центре озера янтарь, веро€тнее всего природа источника искусственна€ и вполне возможно отключить его. “акже, есть опасность, что неблагонадежные элементы могут получить доступ к источнику излучени€ и попытатьс€ вз€ть его под свой контроль.
Barman: "Duty has a reputation to uphold. That's why they want this thing done quietly. All you need to do it whack the leader called Lucky and bring his PDA as proof."
To join Duty you will need the approval of one of the most respected fighters in the group and also prove to Duty that you are worthy of your place in their ranks.

Barman: "Your mission is to kill Tyrant, the leader of the Mercenaries. His crew made it into the Wild Territory and set up a base at the construction site. Be careful, some of their fighters have set up ambushes on the way to the site. Bring me Tyrant's PDA and the reward is yours."
General Voronin: "The war with Freedom is coming to an end, Marked One. You played your part in fighting for the cause! Now I want to finish this war. The leader of our enemies must be disposed of."

Captain Invantsov: "...before coming to conclusions, pass an easy test. You have to get a folder from the abandoned building opposite. It's not hard, just go inside, take the folder and bring it to me. Piece of cake, right? When I have the folder we'll decide whether you're fit to join Duty or not."
Hunter: "Bring back the rifle. I lost it by the place where bloodsuckers live. I'll upload you the co-ordinates. And be careful, those bastards ain't no joke."

Wolfhound: "We've got a little hunt going on here. We pinned the scientists in over there behind the chopper. My boys are putting some fire down on them from time to time to make sure they don't escape. Join in, we're about to go in and finish 'em off. If you help us I'll give you the scientists' suit... we found it in the chopper we took down. Your target is professor Kruglov. Kill him or he'll run away during the shootout, I know his type. If you kill him the suit is yours, if you don't you don't get jack."
Barman: "All we gotta do is get to the antennae when the emission level drops and turn 'em off. Got it?"

get through to the scientists and avoid the mercenaries' ambush
 
 Kruglov: "Stalker, help! We were attacked by mercenaries and half of our team is dead. Help us and you won't regret it"
 
 "...be careful, there are about fifteen of them but we don't know exactly
Barman: "You need to get through to the scientists and find out where laboratory X16 is located to find the missing documents."

I looked through the documents found at the former Institute. The conclusion is that the Institute was used as a front for a non-state laboratory called X18 in the years preceding the accident. This lab appears to have been conducting some mysterious experiment; its location is not clear from the documents and the military don't seem to know anything about it either. Well, well... the puzzles are multiplying... But perhaps this is the starting point which the traders need. Now I have to travel further north to a trader known as the Barman.
Military documents

Hell... lab X18 wasn't fun...and its current residents...I didn't think things like that existed. I found some documents...I didn't understand much of what they contained except that they are technical specifications for some blocks from Kaimanov emitters. What's interesting is that the blocks were designated for another laboratory with the codename X16 and it's probably a secret one too.
Laboratory X18

Hmm...The traders have dug up a lot of information about these laboratories. The Barman wasn't surprised to find out about the emitters and X16. Now he's convinced that this Brain Burner is man-made. He thinks that laboratory X16 is near the scientists' camp by Amber Lake. It's interesting that they're studying emissions that resemble the effects of the Burner. So now I must pay a visit to the Zone's scientific community.
The Brain Burner is man-made?

I met with the Barman. Having looked through the documents from the Institute he thinks that this X18 is in the so called Dark Valley and offered me to go there to look for information and documents. He says he sent Duty scouts to get into the underground vaults there but they disappeared. The Barman thinks they were captured by bandits who have a base nearby. If that's true everything those Duty guys found will be in the hands of Boar, the leader of the bandits. The Barman told me to be careful and... clearly didn't tell me everything about these underground vaults. Oh well, time to get to work: first of all I need to go pay Boar a visit and if the "conversation" goes well I'll explore the underground.
Barman

Well, I am ready to go to the Burner. I found out the time when the emission levels fall from Crazy and he also told me about a safe place where I can wait for this time. My psy-protection won't work at other times anyway. I'll have to find a way into the underground bunker of lab X19. Inside I should find the controls for the Brain Burner Antennae.
Information about the Burner

12.01.2012 
 God damn my bosses...won't leave an old man alone. First Black Mesa, then some strange town in Russia. And now they send poor little Gordon into the endless Ukrainian plains. Take your jemmy and have fun. 
 
 20.03.2012 
 Made it into the Zone. Are there really no bears here? Who am I going to fight then? I'm not finding my bearings too well in this place. In America everyone recognises me and gives me hamburgers for free but here I had to give my little crowbar away for a can of meat. 
 
 26.04.2012 
 The emission has started. The barman told me to hide my American ass and keep it hidden. I chased some rats out of an abandoned tunnel. I hope to wait out the bad weather in here.
Gordon's PDA
